data: in vitro assay evidence | western blot
NUAK1 phosphorylation on Thr211 by STK11 complex activates NUAK1.
in vitro assay evidence | point mutation evidence used in manual assertion | western blot
Basal activity of NUAK1-Thr211Ala mutant is low and is not increased by phosphorylation by STK11 complex.
